Partners.title: Our Partners
Partners.description: We work in collaboration with leading organizations in agriculture and climate to strengthen agroclimatic information systems worldwide.

Hero.title: Create bulletins with
Hero.description: Platform to create, review and export professional agroclimatic bulletins collaboratively.

VisualResources.title: Visual Resources
VisualResources.subtitle: Manage visual files for your agroclimatic bulletins: images, backgrounds and icons.
VisualResources.uploadFirst: Start by uploading your first visual files
VisualResources.customFileNameHelp: If left empty, the original file name will be used. Extension will be added automatically.
VisualResources.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{fileName}"? This action cannot be undone.

Features.title: Everything you need to create
Features.description: A collaborative tool that simplifies the process of creating, reviewing and exporting agroclimatic bulletins.

feature1.title: Bulletin Generation
feature1.description: Create professional agroclimatic bulletins with an intuitive editor designed specifically for each country.

feature2.title: Flexible Export
feature2.description: Export your bulletins in multiple formats: PDF for printing or images in PNG or JPG format to share on social networks.

feature3.title: Review Workflow
feature3.description: Complete collaborative review system with version control, comments and approvals to ensure content quality.

feature4.title: Custom Templates
feature4.description: Create and save reusable templates that adapt to your specific needs.

Footer.description: Free tool to create agroclimatic bulletins collaboratively.

Templates.title: Create fully customizable new templates
Templates.subtitle: Manage and create agroclimatic bulletin templates with the fields you want, images and charts.
Templates.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to archive {name}? This action will change its status to archived and it will not be visible in the main list.

Create.subtitle: Create a new agroclimatic bulletin template

Bulletins.title: Manage and create agroclimatic bulletins
Bulletins.subtitle: Create, review and export agroclimatic bulletins using customizable templates.

headerFooter.footerDescription: Configure the information that will appear in your bulletin's footer

cardField.noCardsSelected: No cards selected. Select a card to begin.

listField.noItems: No items. Click "Add item" to begin.

publishModal.title: Bulletin Published!
publishModal.message: Your bulletin has been published successfully and is now available.

bulletinPreview.errorMessage: Could not load the bulletin with the provided ID.

CreateTemplate.title: Create New Template
CreateTemplate.subtitle: Design a custom template for your agroclimatic bulletins
CreateTemplate.editSubtitle: Update and improve your agroclimatic bulletin template

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.description: Define the main data for your template

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Describe the purpose and scope of this template...

allowedGroups.label: Allowed Groups
allowedGroups.placeholder: Select groups that can access this template...

generalConfig.title: General Configuration
generalConfig.description: Define the global styles that will be applied to the entire template

commitMessage.label: Version Message
commitMessage.placeholder: Describe the changes in this version...

dimensions.title: Bulletin Dimensions

preset.label: Predefined Format
preset.help: Select a predefined format or choose Custom to define your own dimensions.

dimensions.help: You can manually modify the dimensions at any time.

styles.title: Global Styles
styles.previewText: This is sample text that shows how the applied styles will look.

preview.title: Style Preview
preview.sampleText: This is how your text will look
preview.backgroundNote: Background color will be applied to the entire document
preview.subtitle: Sample subtitle
preview.text: This is sample body text that shows how your content will look with the selected styles.
preview.smallText: Small text for additional details and notes.

headerFooter.title: Header and Footer Configuration
headerFooter.description: Configure the fields that will appear in the header and footer

header.title: What is a Header?
header.description: The header appears at the beginning of each page of the bulletin. It's ideal for titles, dates, logos and general information.

footer.title: What is a Footer?
footer.description: The footer appears at the end of each page of the bulletin. It's perfect for page numbering, contact information and credits.

fields.title: Fields
fields.emptyHint: Add fields to customize this component

globalStyles.title: Global Styles
globalStyles.iconUseOriginalColorHelp: If disabled, the icon will use the primary color from the context
globalStyles.borderSidesHelp: Select which sides should display the border
globalStyles.previewText: This is sample text that shows how the applied styles will look.
globalStyles.help: These styles will be applied to the entire component. Individual field styles can override these values.

fieldsLayout.label: Fields organization
fieldsLayout.help: Define how fields will be organized within the component.

sections.title: Sections Configuration
sections.description: Design the main sections of your template content

noSections.title: No sections yet
noSections.description: Sections are the main building blocks of your template. Each section can contain multiple content blocks.

empty.title: No sections
empty.description: Add your first section to start structuring your template

block.nameHelp: This name helps identify the block in the configuration
block.stylesDescription: Block styles will be applied to the container that groups the fields
block.fieldsHelp: Fields define what information will be collected in this block

overview.title: General Configuration
overview.sectionNameHelp: This name will appear in the navigation.
overview.pageOrderHelp: Defines the order of this page in the final bulletin
overview.iconHelp: Optional icon that will appear next to the section name
overview.sectionStylesDescription: These styles will be applied to all blocks and fields in this section, unless overridden.

blocksTab.title: Content Blocks
blocksTab.infoMessage: Blocks organize the content within each page. Each block can contain multiple fields with different types of information.
blocksTab.noBlocksDescription: Blocks organize the content within each page.

headerTab.title: Section Header
headerTab.description: Configure a specific header for this section. This header will replace the global header only on this page.
headerTab.priorityMessage: If you configure a header here, it will take priority over the global template header. If you don't configure anything, the global header will be used automatically.
headerTab.usingGlobalHelp: This section is using the global header. Click "Customize" to create a specific version that you can modify independently.
headerTab.confirmRestore: Are you sure you want to remove the customization and revert to the global header?

footerTab.title: Section Footer
footerTab.description: Configure a specific footer for this section. This footer will replace the global footer only on this page.
footerTab.priorityMessage: If you configure a footer here, it will take priority over the global template footer. If you don't configure anything, the global footer will be used automatically.
footerTab.usingGlobalHelp: This section is using the global footer. Click "Customize" to create a specific version that you can modify independently.
footerTab.confirmRestore: Are you sure you want to remove the customization and revert to the global footer?

iconSelector.title: Select Icon for Section
iconSelector.uploadPrompt: Upload icons in the Visual Resources section

fieldEditor.title: Field Editor
fieldEditor.noConfig: No specific configurations for this field type

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.form: Show in form for bulletin creation
visibility.formHelp: If not shown in the form, the label and description will be automatically assigned from the display name

fieldId.label: Field ID
fieldId.help: Unique identifier (no spaces or special characters)

form.label: Show in form
form.help: The field will appear in the data entry form

bulletin.label: Show in bulletin
bulletin.help: The field will appear in the final bulletin

textConfig.subtypeHelp: Short: single line text. Long: multiline text area.
textConfig.validationsHelp: These validations will be applied when the user fills out the form.

textWithIconConfig.iconOptionsHelp: These are the icon options that the user will be able to choose from when filling out the form.
textWithIconConfig.showLabelFormHelp: If active, "label: value" will be displayed in the bulletin
textWithIconConfig.showLabelPreviewHelp: If active, the label will be displayed next to the value in the bulletin
textWithIconConfig.validationsHelp: These validations will be applied when the user fills out the form.

dateRangeConfig.showMoonPhasesHelp: Display moon phase icons next to each date
dateRangeConfig.moonPhasesConfigHelp: Select the moon phase for each date (only when form is disabled)

pageNumberConfig.help: Use '{page}' for current page and '{total}' for total pages
pageNumberConfig.previewHelp: This is a preview. Page numbers will be generated automatically.

listConfig.itemsPerPageHelp: If specified, the list will be divided into pages with this number of elements
listConfig.schemaDescription: Define the fields that each list item will have
listConfig.noFieldsMessage: No fields defined. Click 'Add Field' to start.
listConfig.itemsDescription: Define the items that will be displayed in the bulletin
listConfig.noItemsMessage: No items. Click 'Add Item' to start.
listConfig.defineSchemaFirst: First define the elements schema above
listConfig.imageLabelHelp: Text that will appear below the image

imageConfig.predefinedImageHelp: Since this field is not shown in the form (form = false), you must specify the image that will be displayed directly in the bulletin
imageConfig.showLabelHelp: If enabled, a label will be displayed below the image
imageConfig.labelTextHelp: Text that will appear below the image
imageConfig.availableImagesHelp: Add the images that the user can select for this field
imageConfig.galleryPreviewHelp: The user will be able to select one of these images

imageUploadConfig.allowedFormatsHelp: Select the image formats that users can upload
imageUploadConfig.noFormatsSelectedWarning: Warning: No formats selected. Users won't be able to upload images.
imageUploadConfig.maxFileSizeHelp: Maximum size allowed for uploaded images
imageUploadConfig.previewDimensionsHelp: Define the exact dimensions the image will occupy in the bulletin preview

defaultConfig.title: Configuration for type "{type}"
defaultConfig.message: This field type does not have specific configuration implemented yet.
defaultConfig.helpText: General properties (name, description, styles) are available in the other sections of the editor.

selectWithIconsConfig.allowMultipleHelp: If enabled, users will be able to select multiple options
selectWithIconsConfig.showLabelHelp: If enabled, the option text will be displayed next to the icon
selectWithIconsConfig.noOptionsMessage: No options defined. Click 'Add Option' to get started.

searchableConfig.noOptionsMessage: No options defined. Click 'Add Option' to get started.
searchableConfig.help: Users will be able to search among these options or create a new one if it doesn't exist

selectBackgroundConfig.noOptionsMessage: No options defined. Click 'Add Option' to get started.

climateDataConfig.label: Label
climateDataConfig.noParameters: No climate parameters configured. Click 'Add Parameter' to get started.
climateDataConfig.helpParameter: Each parameter represents a type of climate data
climateDataConfig.helpColName: The column name must match the data file
climateDataConfig.helpType: Use 'Number' for numeric values and 'Text' for observations
climateDataConfig.helpUnit: The unit will be displayed alongside the value in the bulletin

cardConfig.help: Select the cards that the user will be able to choose for this field
cardConfig.noResults: No cards found with that name

moonCalendarConfig.titleHelp: Use {month} as a placeholder for the month name. Example: 'Moon Calendar - {month}' will become 'Moon Calendar - August'
moonCalendarConfig.titleIconHelp: Select an icon to display next to the calendar title

value.label: Value
value.placeholder: Value to display in the bulletin
value.help: Since this field doesn't appear in the form, you must define here the value that will be shown
value.noIconsAvailable: No icons available. Please upload icons in the Visual Resources section.
value.iconHelp: Select the icon that will accompany the text in the bulletin

styleConfig.iconUseOriginalColorHelp: If disabled, the icon will use the primary color from the context
styleConfig.borderSidesHelp: Select which sides should display the border
styleConfig.previewText: This is sample text that shows how the applied styles will look.

Roles.title: Role Management
Roles.subtitle: Roles define user permissions and access levels in the platform. Each role has specific permissions for different system modules using a CRUD model (Create, Read, Update, Delete).
Roles.searchPlaceholder: Search roles by name or description...

table.noModulesEnabled: This role has no enabled modules

Roles.noRolesSystem: No roles configured in the system

permissionsInfo.title: System Permission Modules
permissionsInfo.crudNote: Each module can have {create}, {read}, {update}, and {delete} permissions (CRUD).

CreateRole.title: Create New Role
CreateRole.subtitle: Define permissions and access for a new role in the system
CreateRole.subtitleEdit: Modify permissions and access for the existing role
CreateRole.roleNameMinLength: Name must be at least 3 characters
CreateRole.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the responsibilities and scope of this role...
CreateRole.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
CreateRole.permissionsRequired: At least one permission must be enabled for the role
CreateRole.permissionsNote: Note: CRUD permissions allow: Create new resources, Read and view information, Update existing resources, and Delete resources. Make sure to grant only the necessary permissions for each role.

Groups.title: Group Management
Groups.subtitle: Groups organize users by geographic affiliation and facilitate permission management. Each group represents a country or region and contains users with specific roles.
Groups.searchPlaceholder: Search groups by name, country or description...

table.noUsers: This group has no assigned users

Groups.noGroupsSystem: No groups configured in the system

groupsInfo.title: About Groups
groupsInfo.description: Groups allow organizing users by geographic location (country) and assigning specific roles to manage bulletins and resources collaboratively.
groupsInfo.benefit2: Assignment of specific roles per group

CreateGroup.title: Create New Group
CreateGroup.subtitle: Define a new geographic group and assign users with specific roles
CreateGroup.subtitleEdit: Modify information and users of the existing group
CreateGroup.groupNameMinLength: Name must be at least 3 characters
CreateGroup.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the scope and purpose of this group...
CreateGroup.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
CreateGroup.usersAccessDescription: Assign users and their roles in this group. You can add users after creating the group.
CreateGroup.usersNote: Note: Added users will have access to the group with the specified roles. Make sure the IDs are valid.

countryInfo.title: Country Codes (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)
countryInfo.examples: Examples: CO (Colombia), VN (Vietnam), BR (Brazil), US (United States), MX (Mexico)

Cards.title: Manage reusable cards for your bulletins
Cards.subtitle: Cards are predefined content you can insert into your bulletins: pests, diseases, crop information and recommendations.
Cards.searchPlaceholder: Search cards by name or type...
Cards.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
Cards.duplicateConfirmMessage: Enter the name for the new duplicated card:

CreateCard.subtitle: Define predefined content that can be used in bulletins

messages.duplicateCardName: A card with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.name: Card Name
basicInfo.typeHelp: Select card type based on its purpose
basicInfo.accessTypeHelp: Define who can use this card
basicInfo.allowedGroupsHelp: Hold Ctrl/Cmd to select multiple groups

errors.groupsRequired: You must select at least one group for restricted cards

content.title: Card Content
content.description: Configure blocks and fields that will form the card content
content.backgroundUrlHelp: Background image URL for the card
content.noBlocks: No blocks yet. Add the first block to get started.
content.noFields: This block has no fields yet
content.blockNameHelp: This name helps identify the block in configuration
content.blockStylesDescription: Block styles will be applied to the container that groups the fields. Use 'Padding' for internal space and 'Gap' for space between fields within the block.
content.noFieldsHelp: Fields define what information will be collected in this block
content.backgroundImageHelp: Select an image from visual resources to use as background
content.backgroundColorHelp: The color will be applied if no background image is selected
content.paddingHelp: Internal space between card border and its content

errors.blocksRequired: You must add at least one block
